== New Features ==
** Add build dependency on libglib2.0-dev
** Add support for different power methods to suspend
** Add copyright for the derivative work from systemd
** Update man page with information on the --pm-method parameter
** Use pkg-config to include glib and gio
** Add build dependency on pkg-config
** Add cpuinfo dump
** Add cpuinfo.log to man page
** Add _PCL control method test (LP:1343070)
** acpica: update to version 20140627 (LP: #1335280)
** Add a test for sanity checking for the UEFI Boot path (LP: #1316019)
** uefi: uefirtvariable: print out the duplicate variable name (LP: #1340492)
** uefidump: add Relative Offset Range subtype support for Media device path (LP: #1322465)
